verses.verse: Then Job<WH347> responded,<WH6030> <WH559>
"How<WH575> long<WH5704> will you torment<WH3013> me, And crush<WH1792> me with words<WH4405>?
"These<WH2088> ten<WH6235> times<WH6471> you have insulted<WH3637> me, You are not ashamed<WH954> to wrong<WH1970> me.
"Even<WH637> if I have truly<WH551> erred,<WH7686> My error<WH4879> lodges<WH3885> with me.
"If<WH518> indeed<WH551> you vaunt<WH1431> yourselves against<WH5921> me, And prove<WH3198> my disgrace<WH2781> to me,
Know<WH3045> then<WH645> that God<WH433> has wronged<WH5791> me, And has closed<WH5362> His net<WH9285> around<WH5362> me.
"Behold,<WH2005> I cry,<WH6817> 'Violence!<WH2555>' but I get<WH6030> no<WH3808> answer;<WH6030> I shout<WH7768> for help,<WH7768> but there<WH369> is no<WH369> justice.<WH4941>
"He has walled<WH1443> up my way<WH734> so that I cannot<WH3808> pass;<WH5674> And He has put<WH7760> darkness<WH2822> on my paths.<WH9350>
"He has stripped<WH6584> my honor<WH9202> from me, And removed<WH5493> the crown<WH5850> from my head.<WH7218>
"He breaks<WH5422> me down<WH5422> on every<WH5439> side,<WH5439> and I am gone;<WH1980> And He has uprooted<WH5265> my hope<WH8615> like a tree.<WH6086>
"He has also kindled<WH2734> His anger<WH639> against<WH5921> me, And considered<WH2803> me as His enemy.<WH6862>
"His troops<WH1416> come<WH935> together,<WH3162> And build<WH5549> up their way<WH1870> against<WH5921> me, And camp<WH2583> around<WH5439> my tent.<WH168>
"He has removed<WH7368> my brothers<WH251> far<WH7368> from me, And my acquaintances<WH3045> are completely<WH389> estranged<WH2114> from me.
"My relatives<WH7138> have failed,<WH2308> And my intimate<WH3045> friends<WH3045> have forgotten<WH7911> me.
"Those who live<WH1481> in my house<WH1004> and my maids<WH519> consider<WH2803> me a stranger.<WH2114> I am<WH1961> a foreigner<WH5237> in their sight.<WH5869>
"I call<WH7121> to my servant,<WH5650> but he does not answer,<WH6030> I have to implore<WH2603> him with my mouth.<WH6310>
"My breath<WH7307> is offensive<WH9101> to my wife,<WH802> And I am loathsome<WH9152> to my own brothers.<WH1121> <WH990>
"Even<WH1571> young<WH5759> children<WH5759> despise<WH3988> me; I rise<WH6965> up and they speak<WH1696> against me.
"All<WH3605> my associates<WH4962> abhor<WH8581> me, And those<WH2088> I love<WH157> have turned<WH2015> against me.
"My bone<WH6106> clings<WH1692> to my skin<WH5785> and my flesh,<WH1320> And I have escaped<WH4422> [only] by the skin<WH5785> of my teeth.<WH8127>
"Pity<WH2603> me, pity<WH2603> me, O you my friends,<WH7453> For the hand<WH3027> of God<WH433> has struck<WH5221> me.
"Why<WH4100> do you persecute<WH7291> me as God<WH410> [does,] And are not satisfied<WH7646> with my flesh<WH1320>?
"Oh<WH4310> <WH5414> that my words<WH4405> were written!<WH3789> Oh<WH4310> <WH5414> that they were inscribed<WH2710> in a book!<WH5612>
"That with an iron<WH1270> stylus<WH5842> and lead<WH5777> They were engraved<WH2672> in the rock<WH6697> forever!<WH5703>
"And as for me, I know<WH3045> that my Redeemer<WH1350> lives,<WH2416> And at the last<WH314> He will take<WH6965> His stand<WH6965> on the earth.<WH6083>
"Even after<WH310> my skin<WH5785> is destroyed,<WH9346> Yet from my flesh<WH1320> I shall see<WH2372> God;<WH433>
Whom<WH834> I myself<WH589> shall behold,<WH2372> And whom my eyes<WH5869> shall see<WH7200> and not another.<WH2114> My heart<WH3629> faints<WH3615> within<WH2436> me.
"If<WH3588> you say,<WH559> 'How<WH4100> shall we persecute<WH7291> him?' And 'What pretext<WH8328> for a case<WH1697> against him can we find<WH4672>?'
"[Then] be afraid<WH9076> of the sword<WH2719> for yourselves, For wrath<WH2534> [brings] the punishment<WH5771> of the sword,<WH2719> So<WH4616> that you may know<WH3045> there is judgment.<WH1779>"
